uni.hamburg.yamms.solver
Class AdaptiveStepsizeSolver

java.lang.Object
  uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.Solver
      uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.AdaptiveStepsizeSolver
Direct Known Subclasses:
DormandPrinceSolver
public abstract class AdaptiveStepsizeSolver
extends Solver

Adaptive stepsize integrator. Defines a step handling mechanism that is based on a time interval in which the handler is called.

Author:
Claas Abert

Method Detail

addInterpolatedHandler

public abstract void addInterpolatedHandler(StepHandler handler,
                                            double interval)
Adds a step handler to the integrator that is called every interval time (the integration time). The state passed to the handler is interpolated if necessary.

Parameters:
handler - the step handler
interval - the call interval
